msg.msgText: User authentication is enabled in the admin endpoint. You must configure an external LDAP server, or set AdminUserID and AdminUserPassword.

msgExplanation.p: UsePasswordAuthentication is enabled in the security profile associated with the admin endpoint. You must configure an external LDAP server, or set AdminUserID and AdminUserPassword.

msgUserResponse.p: Either configure an external LDAP or set AdminUserID and AdminUserPassword.
